snippet: Former President Charles Taylor of Liberia arrived in Britain on Tuesday to serve the remainder of his 50-year sentence in an unspecified prison.
abstract: Former Pres Charles Taylor of Liberia arrives in Britain to serve remainder of his 50-year sentence for war crimes.
lead_paragraph: Former President Charles Taylor of Liberia arrived in Britain on Tuesday to serve the remainder of his 50-year sentence in an unspecified prison.

headline.main: Britain: Former Liberian President Is Transferred to British Prison
